alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 4:11AM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total two day snow accumulations of 6 to 22 inches from Friday through Saturday. The smallest amounts will be in far southern and southeastern Iron County near the Crystal Falls area. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Baraga, Iron and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 1 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact multiple morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
